column4: My sound works perfectly in Gnome,but won't work in KDE... What can i do?
or go into KDE control center and go to Sound and "Test Sound"
or systemsettings, as in the K Menu
meaning i need the mp3 package
why do i need it again even if i have it in gnome?
are you using a different player?
check the Kubuntu FAQ on http://kubuntu.org
because it sucks. There are far better mp3 players
